item.title: Copy directories and files to and from Kubernetes Container [POD]
item.description: As we all know about SCP Linux command to Copy the files and directories from a remote host to the local host and vice versa over SSH. Similar to that we have ‘KUBECTL CP’ to Copy the files and directories from a Kubernetes Container [POD] to the local host and vice versa. Syntax: kubectl cp <file-spec-src> <file-spec-dest> POD in a specific container kubectl cp <file-spec-src> <file-spec-dest> -c <specific-container> Copy /tmp/foo local file to /tmp/bar in a remote pod in namespace
